title: Snap up a designer beach towel from just £21.99!
content:

What’s more, they’re quick drying and ‘sand-free’ – simply give your towel a shake and you’re good to go. With this exclusive deal, you can get your hands on a single XL towel or a set of 2 from just £37.99!
